verses.verse: בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> In the third לְצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> were gone forth בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> they בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> came מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> they [into] the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai

וַיִּסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> For they were departed מֵרְפִידִ֗ים <S%H7508><s%> from Rephidim וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and were come מִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> [to] the desert סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and had pitched בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וַיִּֽחַן־ <S%H2583><s%> camped שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> and there יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and there Israel נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> front הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> before the mount

וּמֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses עָלָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> went up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> unto God וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אֵלָ֤יו <S%H413><s%> and to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto him out of the mountain לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus shalt thou say לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְתַגֵּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> and tell לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you רְאִיתֶ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> Ye have seen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> what I did לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> and [how] I bare אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> wings נְשָׁרִ֔ים <S%H5404><s%> you on eagles' וָאָבִ֥א <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> Now therefore if ye will obey תִּשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> indeed בְּקֹלִ֔י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8104><s%> and keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֑י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant וִהְיִ֨יתֶם <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֤י סְגֻלָּה֙ <S%H5459><s%> then ye shall be a peculiar treasure מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> unto me above all people כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לִ֖י כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> for all the earth

וְאַתֶּ֧ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֛י מַמְלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4467><s%> And ye shall be unto me a kingdom כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> of priests וְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation קָד֑וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> and an holy אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> These [are] the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תְּדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> which thou shalt speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> and called לְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> for the elders הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַיָּ֣שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and laid לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> before their faces אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <S%H6030><s%> answered כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> together וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> All that the LORD נַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> we will do וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> Lo I come אֵלֶיךָ֮ <S%H413><s%> unto בְּעַ֣ב <S%H5645><s%> unto thee in a thick הֶֽעָנָן֒ <S%H6051><s%> cloud בַּעֲב֞וּר <S%H5668><s%> so יִשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> may hear הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> that the people בְּדַבְּרִ֣י <S%H1696><s%> when I speak עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> you וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and may also בְּךָ֖ יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> with thee and believe לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> thee for ever וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> told מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ם <S%H6942><s%> and sanctify הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them to day וּמָחָ֑ר <S%H4279><s%> and to morrow וְכִבְּס֖וּ <S%H3526><s%> and let them wash שִׂמְלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8071><s%> their clothes

וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become נְכֹנִ֖ים <S%H3559><s%> And be ready לַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> against the third כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> for the third יֵרֵ֧ד <S%H3381><s%> will come down יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> Sinai

וְהִגְבַּלְתָּ֤ <S%H1379><s%> And thou shalt set bounds אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> round about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִשָּׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> Take heed לָכֶ֛ם עֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to yourselves [that ye] go [not] up בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> into the mount וּנְגֹ֣עַ <S%H5060><s%> or touch בְּקָצֵ֑הוּ <S%H7097><s%> the border כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whoever הַנֹּגֵ֥עַ <S%H5060><s%> of it whosoever toucheth בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> the mount מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall be surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> put to death

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No תִגַּ֨ע <S%H5060><s%> touch בּ֜וֹ יָ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> There shall not an hand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for סָק֤וֹל <S%H5619><s%> it but he shall surely יִסָּקֵל֙ <S%H5619><s%> be stoned אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or יָרֹ֣ה <S%H3384><s%> shot יִיָּרֶ֔ה <S%H3384><s%> through אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or בְּהֵמָ֥ה <S%H929><s%> whether [it be] beast אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No יִחְיֶ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> it shall not live בִּמְשֹׁךְ֙ <S%H4900><s%> soundeth long הַיֹּבֵ֔ל <S%H3104><s%> when the trumpet הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יַעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> they shall come up בָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> to the mount

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> from the mount אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וַיְקַדֵּשׁ֙ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַֽיְכַבְּס֖וּ <S%H3526><s%> and they washed שִׂמְלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8071><s%> their clothes

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people הֱי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> Be נְכֹנִ֖ים <S%H3559><s%> ready לִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> against the third יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> day אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּגְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H5066><s%> come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> not at [your] wives

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֜י <S%H7992><s%> And it came to pass on the third בִּֽהְיֹ֣ת <S%H1961><s%> came הַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came קֹלֹ֨ת <S%H6963><s%> that there were thunders וּבְרָקִ֜ים <S%H1300><s%> and lightnings וְעָנָ֤ן <S%H6051><s%> cloud כָּבֵד֙ <S%H3515><s%> and a thick עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> upon the mount וְקֹ֥ל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice שֹׁפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet חָזָ֣ק <S%H2389><s%> loud מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> exceeding וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <S%H2729><s%> trembled כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> so that all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> that [was] in the camp

וַיּוֹצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> brought forth מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7125><s%> to meet הָֽאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> with God מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> out of the camp וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <S%H3320><s%> and they stood בְּתַחְתִּ֥ית <S%H8482><s%> at the nether הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> part of the mount

וְהַ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> And mount סִינַי֙ <S%H5514><s%> Sinai עָשַׁ֣ן <S%H6225><s%> was altogether on a smoke כֻּלּ֔וֹ <S%H3605><s%> all מִ֠פְּנֵי <S%H6440><s%> accept אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> descended עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> upon it in fire וַיַּ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> thereof ascended עֲשָׁנוֹ֙ <S%H6227><s%> and the smoke כְּעֶ֣שֶׁן <S%H6227><s%> as the smoke הַכִּבְשָׁ֔ן <S%H3536><s%> of a furnace וַיֶּחֱרַ֥ד <S%H2729><s%> quaked כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> and the whole mount מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> And when the voice הַשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet הוֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> long וְחָזֵ֣ק <S%H2390><s%> and waxed louder מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and louder מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses יְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> spake וְהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God יַעֲנֶ֥נּוּ <S%H6030><s%> answered בְקֽוֹל׃ <S%H6963><s%> sounded

וַיֵּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount סִינַ֖י <S%H5514><s%> Sinai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> [up] to רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> on the top הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mount וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לְמֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the top הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mount וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> and Moses
